name: Launching Gecks
description:
- Controls

Hold the spinning gecko and drag it back to launch.

- Story

Once, there was a land, full of lizard people and then, one day, a mysterious force infected the earth. This force penetrated the water supply, and in turn, infected most life on the planet. Once the land was under the force's control, it began to instruct the lizard people to collect the yellow liquid for reuse on other planets.

The liquid is contained in barrels and is delivered to the creator of the mysterious force. One brave gecko called "Gecks" manage to avoid the calamity and was horrified and angry about how his fellow lizard was being used to fuel a war machine. One day, Gecks decided to do something about it and end the oppression over his people. 

- Game Content

There are five small levels at the moment, with a start and end screen. I will be adding more levels and environments in future.

Any donations would be greatly appreciated and will encourage me to add more to this game.

- 26/05/2022 update

I have added two new levels and have made some minor improvements to the game

I hope you enjoy.
